Event.name: Hunting_success_or_failure
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fex name="Hunter">Hunter</fex> succeeds or fails at capturing his sought-out or tracked <fex name="Food">Food</fex>.
<ex><fex name="Hunter">We</fex> <t>bagged</t> <fex name="Food">six roosters</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Hunter">Bottom trawlers</fex> <t>catch</t> <fex name="Food">fish that live on or near the seafloor</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Hunter
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Hunter</fen> is the agent that has successfully obtained <fen>Food</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Food
Arg.definition: <def-root><fen>Food</fen> is the item obtained by the <fen>Hunter</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Instrument</fen> is used by the <fen>Hunter</fen> as a tool to obtain <fen>Food</fen>.
<ex>He could easily <t>catch</t> fish <fex name="Instrument">with his hands</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which the <fen>Food</fen> is obtained.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The greater geographic location where the <fen>Hunter</fen> obtains <fen>Food</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>An action that the <fen>Hunter</fen> intends to accomplish obtaining <fen>Food</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the amount of effort the <fen>Hunter</fen> puts into an attempt to obtain <fen>Food</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Particular_iteration
Arg.definition: <def-root>Expressions marked with this extra-thematic FE modify a non-iterative use of the target, and indicate that it is conceived as embedded within an iterated series of similar events or states.</def-root>
